title: Adaptive Sci-Fi Music: Retrofuturistic Dystopia
description: Adaptive music (with included blueprint system) designed for a dystopian, cyberpunk and/or sci-fi action game. Also includes menu music and trailer music.
longDescription:
Dark alleys between neon-lit streets; floating cars weaving between endless skyscrapers; mega-corporations enacting lethal enforcement while androids are hidden among the crowds. This is a future made of both dreams and nightmares.


This is the first of an intended series of adaptive sci-fi music packs. These packs are intended to be broad rather than deep, so that developers can maintain a consistent musical landscape from in-game, to menus to trailers. There are three sets of dystopian, cyberpunk-esque tracks, plus a bonus orchestral-only set.


Multiple implementation options are provided for the adaptive tracks:

- Compiled loops

- Looping adaptive stems for use with an included custom blueprint

- Original adaptive stems with tails for use with middleware such as FMOD or Wwise


Selection of compiled loops: https://youtu.be/Cb6Z9XvxLVs

In-game demo for Track 1 - Electric Alleys: https://youtu.be/mwd7vKCHdSU

In-game demo for Track 2 - Unravelling the Simulation: https://youtu.be/LEkKGi0rBaA

In-game demo for Track 3 - Critical Malfunction: https://youtu.be/1fMBIA_Y4ug

In-game demo for Track 4 - Hero's Stand: https://youtu.be/XAcuD7Agt6E


Walkthrough and Tutorial: https://youtu.be/THCowiVnRgI
technicalDetails:
Features:

Unique Tracks:Â 11

4 Adaptive Tracks, each with:

  • Low Threat layer
  • High Threat layer
  • Battle layer
  • 2 melody layers
  • Blueprints to utilize tracks easily

4 Menu Tracks, each with:

  • Lead-in version
  • Looping version

3 Trailer Tracks, each with:

  • 2 minute version
  • 1 minute version

Number of Audio Wavs: 72

Number of Audio Cues: 72

Sample rate: 44100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes (Adaptive & Menu Tracks), No (Trailer Tracks)

Minutes of audio provided: 28 (not including broken out stems)

Supported Development Platforms: All

Documentation: Retrofuturistic Dystopia - Music by Peter Gagliardi

Important/Additional Notes: Sample FMOD project available on request & proof of purchase.
